response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the croissant into the suitcase. Now, we need to pick up the hamburger from the breakfast table and put it into the suitcase.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the breakfast table.
(2) Pick up the croissant from the breakfast table.
(3) Put the croissant into the suitcase.
(4) Pick up the hamburger from the breakfast table.
(5) Put the hamburger into the suitcase.
(6) Pick up the cheese tart from the breakfast table.
(7) Put the cheese tart into the suitcase.
(8) Move the robot to the car.
(9) Put the suitcase into the car.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Pick up the hamburger from the breakfast table
    hamburger = registry(env, "hamburger_277")
    EasyGrasp(robot, hamburger)
    donothing(env)
